About

I am currently the data analyst at Stratos Inc., a startup in Ann Arbor, MI. Previously, I was a research scientist at Michigan Aerospace Corp., where I worked on applying machine learning algorithms and solving inverse problems. I have also been an adjunct lecturer at Eastern Michigan University, where I have taught Intermediate Algebra and Calculus I. Here is a link to my CV or if you prefer a shorter version, you can see my resume.

This site is a place to host a variety of items, including:

  • My own research
  • Applications to industry
  • Career advice
  • Expository notes
  • Math education
  • Anything else related to math or data analysis that doesnâ€™t fit in these categories

I welcome comments as a way for everyone to learn more.
